column1: We can NOT allow taxpayer funded abortion to sneak into the next COVID package which is why I introduced the Protecting Life in Crisis Act.  https://t.co/qNj2G2PqDS
I just introduced a bill to protect our unborn in future COVID-19 healthcare legislation. Read about it👇 https://t.co/R8aMJI7qPk

The heartbeat of accurate and critical hyper local COVID-19 updates for rural communities are small radio television and newspapers. Local media outlets are crucial to continue supporting public awareness. My colleagues and I are calling on the Executive Branch to take action👇🏼 https://t.co/QOXaOLUYoB

#COVID19 triggered countless challenges and obstacles for families across America. Whether they are physically affected by the virus or battling financial stress and personal chaos due to several unexpected changes. Amidst this uncertain time Americans are stronger than ever.

Democrats threaten vital aid for farmers and ranchers. I agree with @FarmBureau the nation's largest farm and ranch organization:  Congress should "pass coronavirus relief including full CCC funding and authority without delay." https://t.co/dzv43rM0tn
Live now on KCRS for the Morning Drive to talk #COVID19 👉 https://t.co/PicyGLKjf4
